title: An impossible find; a luxury unit in Downtown Northville 1 bed/1 bath
map_address: 331 East Cady Street near East Cady Street
posting_body: An impossible find; a luxury unit in Downtown Northville, right off of Main Street, in one of the most sought after buildings in town, the New Victorian!
Don't miss out on this fully updated, top floor, corner unit!
Large windows, and covered patio balcony provide beautiful views of downtown.
Open floor plan, entertainment-ready kitchen, stainless appliances, gas stove, hand scraped hardwood flooring, and gorgeous gas fire place are sure to check off the must-haves!
Large bedroom,  ample storage closets, and laundry room with storage, are sure to impress!
Fully secure building offers electronic access locking system, and key code access elevator.
Secured personal storage unit is perfect for bikes, and boxes!

New Victorian as recently been fully refreshed with new luxurious designer carpeting, Restoration hardware chandeliers and scones, painted with Scuff-X paint in Restoration Hardware themed colors, & a new roof installed.
